inazuma.name: Inazuma
inazuma.description:
Lightning flashes, then passes, illuminating the solitude of thunder.
Dreams of madness come and go — all things are impermanent.
inazuma.descriptionraw: Lightning flashes, then passes, illuminating the solitude of thunder.\nDreams of madness come and go — all things are impermanent.

sumeru.name: Sumeru
sumeru.description:
Oh grass of wisdom, weep not!
Even the travail through searing winds must end.
The blessed rains will fall, and the flowers shall bloom...
Hearken! The song of the verdant garden is sung once more.
sumeru.descriptionraw:
Oh grass of wisdom, weep not!
Even the travail through searing winds must end.
The blessed rains will fall, and the flowers shall bloom...
Hearken! The song of the verdant garden is sung once more.

liyue.name: Liyue
liyue.description:
As eternal as the moon, as long-lasting as the rising sun.
By earth and hill and bedrock shall all things prosper.
liyue.descriptionraw: As eternal as the moon, as long-lasting as the rising sun.\nBy earth and hill and bedrock shall all things prosper.

mondstadt.name: Mondstadt
mondstadt.description:
The ceaseless whisper of the breeze plays upon the strings, creating a lovely music.
The passionate talk of the wind and flowers is blown away, falling into the heart of the clear spring.
mondstadt.descriptionraw: The ceaseless whisper of the breeze plays upon the strings, creating a lovely music.\nThe passionate talk of the wind and flowers is blown away, falling into the heart of the clear spring.
